gui
Interface GUIConstants

All Known Implementing Classes:
ConfigFrame, Console, ControlPanelFrame, CPActionListener, CPMenuBar, CPModes, CPNew, CPStepper, CPViewSettings, GUIReferences, InformationFrame, ViewPort, VPGraphicsPainter, WindowListeners
public interface GUIConstants

List of constants related to the GUI.

Author:
Frederik Nordahl Sabroe
